instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3435: What is 820-3435? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.A1465: What is A1465? A1465 is a model number for a 11 inch size MacBook Air from years Early 2015, Mid 2012, Mid 2013, Early 2014 with EMC 2924, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00164, 820-3208, 820-3435..

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3435</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Mac Air Fan replacement part number?
threads.message: I have a mid 2013 MacAir 11".   My fan is starting to act spotty and after I recently replaced my IO board I noticed the ribbon cable doesn't seem to seat fully.    I want to order a replacement to have on hand as a backup.    Help with the part number please?   Thx

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3435</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Mac Air Fan replacement part number?
threads.message:
You should search by part, machine model and year...
<MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1465</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> 2013 fan, for example...
